resources.string: Here\'s the privacy policy, if you\'re into such kind of things
The whole purpose of this tiny app is to degrade quality of your photos, so that they would take less space (doesn\'t matter, if they would start looking horrible)
Why does the app look so unpolished?
Because I didn\'t polish it! I made it in one weekend for personal use, but then thought that maybe someone else would also find it handy
